definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]

sentences.english: He was headed for Tokyo Disneyland.
sentences.chinese: 他是冲着东京迪斯尼乐园去的。
欧洲迪斯尼的股票价格迅速上涨了17便士。
迪斯尼已经成为必须要去的地方。

sentences.english: Something similar appears to have happened at Disney.
sentences.chinese: 类似事件也同样发生在迪斯尼身上。

sentences.english: Fischer is currently working for Disney on the Tron franchise.
sentences.chinese: 费谢尔现在在为Tron特许的迪斯尼工作。

sentences.english: Right now the Disney park charge visitors exorbitant price for food gifts and entry.
sentences.chinese: 现在迪斯尼公园的食物，礼品，门票都超贵。

sentences.english: Disney world is a wonderful theme park.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼世界是个极好的主题乐园。

sentences.english: While Disney allowed all the outdoor elements of the celebration to be free to the public.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼乐园的所以外部庆典活动都想大众免费开放。

sentences.english: Walt Disney, the great film-maker, was born in 1901.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特迪斯尼，伟大的电影制片人，生于1901年。

sentences.english: I am thrilled that Hyperion , the publishing arm of Disney, will be publishing the book.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴迪斯尼的海波公司将出版这本书。

sentences.english: Disney song from the Disney animation movie "Pocahontas."
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼从迪斯尼动画电影“风中奇缘”的歌曲。

sentences.english: Disney song from the Disney animation movie "Pocahontas."
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼从迪斯尼动画电影“风中奇缘”的歌曲。

sentences.english: He oversees animation at both Pixar and Disney.
sentences.chinese: 拉塞特同时兼任了皮克斯和迪斯尼的动画监制。

sentences.english: At the next intersection, turn left and you’ll be at the entrance to Disney World.
sentences.chinese: 在下一个路口再向左转你就到了迪斯尼乐园的门口了。

sentences.english: Disneyland is in Los Angeles suburb.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼游乐场在洛杉矶的近郊。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
Time Warner Inc., US media company
Disneyland/also written 迪士尼樂園|迪士尼乐园[Di2 shi4 ni2 Le4 yuan2]
